alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 01 at 9:51PM CDT until September 01 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR COLLINGSWORTH COUNTY... At 951 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Quail, or 9 miles northeast of Memphis, moving south at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Dodson, Dozier, Lutie, Samnorwood and Quail. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
